title: RHOP: The Sassed and the Furious
description:
iTunes: http://bit.ly/ituneswwc

Video Recaps: http://bit.ly/crappensvideo

Listen: https://watch-what-crappens.simplecast.com

*Also avail as video on Crappens On Demand http://bit.ly/crappensvideo* Candiace shoots her music video on this week's Real Housewives of Potomac, and her mother is there to judge every second of it. This week's bonus is a Snap Judgement breakdown of the Great British Baking Show contestants. Find all of our premium bonus episodes at https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
